extension.description: Stream all of your favourites sports, movies and tv from http://www.wliptv.com. Requires a registration and paid subscription. Without subscription you can only use Euronews. Please register at wozboxtv.com/registration[CR][CR]Record or display one channel at a time[CR][CR]Record recursively based on text search in the wliptv.com TV guide[CR][CR]Record from dr.dknu, dr.dk Bonanza and FilmOn with special versions of theese addons[CR][CR]Version Date 2016-01-28
